page.title: 18A class visit.
page.content:
{ Ecclesfield Telephone Exchange. { "We went to the Telephone Exchange. It is a new computerised exchange. They have a new dialling tone. When somebody rings up the computer looks for a spare line, then it connects them to the other people. The new computerised exchange is a lot quieter. I like the old dialling tone best."
"The new telephone exchange is computerised and is not as noisy as the old one. There is more room in the new one. The old one breaks down more easily because the things downstairs move around and things move up and down. Parts that move alot break down more easily." { {
